name: Vatanai Maruyama size 4.5m
description: Soft and lightweight woven wrap from Vatanai in delicious, warm pinks and browns. Perfect condition. 100% cotton.

name: WAYDA - Cotton Muslins Small and Large
description:
Exquisite muslin squares available in two sizes. Made in Germany from high quality cotton.

Multipurpose - for men, women, young people, children and babies - how will you wear yours?

Global Grey - solid grey with a very, very slight green tone
Seasonal Green - army green, 'nuff said
Harpers Red - rich rust
Integral Blue - the most perfect denim navy
Paradise Lilac - not lilac at all, but a beautiful warm sand

Two sizes - 70 x70 and 140 x 140

name: Sakura Bloom Double Silk Ring Sling in Teal
description: Statement ring sling by Sakura Bloom in double silk dupion. Rich, deep teal colour. Perfect condition.

name: Easycare Woven Wrap 01 - the Rainbow
description: Rainbow stripes with a light orange weft. Looks fabulous with jeans. Or white, or in addition to this season's block colour combinations. 100% Oeko-tex cotton Easycare woven wrap slings are ideal from newborn and prove equally sturdy and supportive - as well as nice and wide - carriers for heavier babies and toddlers. In short, easycare woven wraps are very high quality and beautifully finished, designed in a range of colourways from subtle to bright.

name: Didymos Indio Terra size 6 (4.7m)
description: Preloved Didymos Indio Terra cotton/linen woven wrap. Soft and fabulous, very stylish and understated. Perfect condition.

name: Ocah Carrier - Didymos 1975 Viola In-between Size Clippee
description:
Rich purple 100% cotton Didymos woven wrap beautifully crafted into a half buckle with webbing waist with extra top stitching. This carrier has harmony straps, leg padding, arms out padding and adjustable sleep hood with pretty vintage fabric.

In-between size is between Standard and Toddler and measures 17.5" wide by 17" tall.

name: Babywearing Rain Poncho
description:
Brilliantly designed babywearing poncho with hoods back and front for baby enabling tandem carrying if required. 

100% waterproof (3000 mm) and made from 100% polyamide ripstop nylon, the poncho offers superb protection from the elements for both parent and child. 

Available in black.

name: Ocah Carrier - easycare 09 In-between size Clippee Waist
description:
With colour that pops, this In-between size Ocah carrier is beautifully made with easycare 09 into a half buckle with webbing waist with extra top stitching. This carrier has harmony straps, leg padding, arms out padding and adjustable sleep hood with pretty vintage fabric.

In-between size is between Standard and Toddler and measures 17.5" wide by 17" tall.

name: Ocah Carrier - easycare 25 Toddler with Clippee Waist
description: Beautifully crafted from easycare 25, this Ocah carrier is toddler size with half buckle, webbing waist, harmony straps, leg padding and arms out padding. It has an adjustable hood complemented on one side by silver silk dupion, and additional silver silk dupion layer on the inner side of the body. Very classy and gender neutral.

name: Easycare Woven Wrap 25 - Neutral Rainbow
description:
Understated shades of navy, light blue, grey, cream and olive. For those who prefer a more muted wrap. Cream weft.

Easycare woven wrap slings are beautifully soft straight out of their lovely matching drawstring bag. No breaking in required. Gentle and comforting against the skin of tiny newborns, they prove equally sturdy and supportive - as well as nice and wide - carriers for heavier babies and toddlers.

In short, easycare woven wraps are very high quality and beautifully finished, designed in a range of colourways from subtle to bright.

name: Easycare Woven Wrap 20
description: Deep red with broad light grey and narrow dark grey stripe. Navy blue weft. Has a kind of '80s vibe. 3.7m, 4.2m and 5.2m sizes are available as a special order which takes approximately 7 working days for delivery. Please do get in touch if you would like to place an order for any sizes not listed as in stock. 100% Oeko-tex cotton Easycare woven wrap slings are beautifully soft straight out of their lovely matching drawstring bag. No breaking in required. Gentle and comforting against the skin of tiny newborns, they prove equally sturdy and supportive - as well as nice and wide - carriers for heavier babies and toddlers. In short, easycare woven wraps are very high quality and beautifully finished, designed in a range of colourways from subtle to bright.

name: Cali Calo Fleece Babywearing Poncho
description:
Simple styling and ease of use make this babywearing poncho from Cali Calo a great option to keep you and your baby warm. Soft and lightweight, the poncho can be used from birth (an additional snap in insert provides coverage for younger babies) for either front or back carries.

The double thickness polo neck can be folded down if required, or left high for added drama.

Made in France from high quality Oeko Tex polar fleece.

Suitable for size UK8 to UK16

name: MaM Design Babywearing Coat - Stone Grey
description:
Made from top-grade microfibre with a high-quality double fleece lining and breathable PUL membrane, the MaM Babywearing Coat is especially suitable for the cold and wet season. It will take you effortlessly from walking the dog in the forest to shopping, week to weekend and from autumn to spring.

The MaM Coat is the most versatile choice. It can be used during pregnancy, carrying a baby on the front or the back, and the best part is that it looks good also without a child. Large flap pockets in front for phone, wallet and spare diaper. Sleeves foldable for perfect length and body slightly flared at the bottom to give enough space for the feet of a toddler.

name: Cali Calo Luna Fleece Babywearing Jacket - Black/Metal Grey
description:
The Cali Calo Luna jacket is perfect for protecting you and your baby from the elements whether carrying in front, or on the back or hip, and can also be worn without a baby at all. Very cosy for both wearer and baby, and simple to use with any type of baby carrier.

Made in France from premium quality, oekotex certified fleece, Cali Calo babywearing jackets come in subtle, stylish colours with pops of brighter accents on the collar, cuffs and pockets.

name: Easycare Woven Wrap 21
description: Black with broad light grey, and red and light grey narrow stripes. Black weft. The red pops - chic. 3.7m, 4.2m and 5.2m sizes are available as a special order which takes approximately 7 working days for delivery. Please do get in touch if you would like to place an order for any sizes not listed as in stock. 100% Oeko-tex cotton Easycare woven wrap slings are beautifully soft straight out of their lovely matching drawstring bag. No breaking in required. Gentle and comforting against the skin of tiny newborns, they prove equally sturdy and supportive - as well as nice and wide - carriers for heavier babies and toddlers.

name: emeibaby carrier - bunt organic
description:
The emeibaby is a soft structured carrier with a unique design - a combination of buckles with the moldable support of a woven wrap. 

Suitable from birth to toddlerhood and beyond, the supportive buckle waist and adjustable, shaped shoulder straps mix cleverly with the use of Girasol woven wraps in the main body of the carrier. Double sling rings at either side of the wrap fabric and the option to spread the fabric wide at the base of the carrier means a great individual fit regardless of the age of the child.

Additional features include a roll-away hood which attaches to the shoulder straps with the use of snaps, extra adjustments buckles between shoulder strap and carrier body, and sliding chest belt. 

From birth to 15kg (33lbs)

Measurements:
Width at base minimum 6" maximum approx 20"
Height of body 15.5"

Suitable for parents from UK6 and up (to a maximum waist of 150cm)

100 % Cotton, Oeko-Tex-Standard 100

Machine washable at 30 degrees

Made in the Czech Republic

name: Flap Happy Wide Brim Sun Hat UPF50 - Bloomin' Dots
description: 100% fine woven cotton sun hat by Flap Happy. Stylish retro/vintage look with a wide, super soft, moldable brim to keep the sun off baby's face and neck, making these hats great for babywearing. The wide brims on these hats also provide discretion when nursing in a carrier/sling.

name: JPMBB Stretchy Wrap - Ecru/Iris
description:
Beautiful colour combinations from subtle to intense make Je Porte Mon Bebe stretchy wraps the perfect choice for the utmost in chic wrapping.

You can choose to pre-tie the wrap then pop Baby in and out without having to untie the wrap. This is really nice with newborns who need frequent changing.

From Pre Tied Advanced Pocket Wrap Cross Carry, Baby can be worn in various positions according to his age and needs, on the front or the hip without having to untie the wrap.

The wrap is dense, stretchy and breathable, it really molds Baby as a second skin and embraces his whole body without creases.

5m long and 70cm wide. Cotton 95% - Spandex 5%. Can be used with children from 2 to 14kg. 2 years warranty (except on seams). Heavy metal-free dye and treatments, Oeko Tex 100 (more info about norms and quality). Learn more about conformity and quality.

The fabric is knit exclusively for JPMBB. There are many stretchy wraps on the market, but none can compare with the JPMBB wrap.

name: Didymos Indio Woven Wrap - Smaragd
description:
Simple and very stylish, a Didymos Indio is a woven wrap design which deserves a place in every babywearer's wardrobe

Smaragd combines royal blue (almost purple) threads with a base of deep petrol green. 

Didymos woven wraps are extremely high quality and have been designed and manufactured entirely in Europe since the company began in 1972. All cotton used is 100% organic. Each wrap comes with a three year guarantee and is presented in a blue Didymos box, complete with pictorial and visual (DVD) tying instructions.

Machine washable at up to 60 degrees celcius

name: emeibaby carrier - antigua organic
description:
The emeibaby is a soft structured carrier with a unique design - a combination of buckles with the moldable support of a woven wrap. 

Suitable from birth to toddlerhood and beyond, the supportive buckle waist and adjustable, shaped shoulder straps mix cleverly with the use of Girasol woven wraps in the main body of the carrier. Double sling rings at either side of the wrap fabric and the option to spread the fabric wide at the base of the carrier means a great individual fit regardless of the age of the child.

Additional features include a roll-away hood which attaches to the shoulder straps with the use of snaps, extra adjustments buckles between shoulder strap and carrier body, and sliding chest belt. 

From birth to 15kg (33lbs)

Measurements:
Width at base minimum 6" maximum approx 20"
Height of body 15.5"

Suitable for parents from UK6 and up (to a maximum waist of 150cm)

100 % Cotton, Oeko-Tex-Standard 100

Machine washable at 30 degrees

Made in the Czech Republic

name: Bra Barn Knot and Ring Shawl - Mint
description:
A lightweight babywearing solution from birth to pre-school.

Mint is a refreshing combination of light turquoise, spearmint and brown threads, with contrasting rails.

Knot Shawl measures 2.75m in length, Ring Shawl 2.05m. Both have a width of 80cm.

A perfect addition to your core babywearing collection, Bra Barn Knot and Ring Shawls are lightweight yet super supportive, and suitable for beginner and experienced babywearers alike.

Bra Barn Ring and Knot Shawls are made from 100% cotton. The cotton used is KO-TEX 100-CERTIFIED which means it fulfils the human-ecological requirements for products with direct contact to the skin. Machine washable at 40 degrees, tumble dry on low heat or let air/drip dry.

name: Mokopuna Merino Wool Footpants
description:
Brilliant for babywearing, and beautifully light and fine, these mokopuna merino wool footpants are ideal for year-round wear. mokopuna merino fibres breathe, so over-warm air and moisture vapour is absorbed by the fibre and evaporated away keeping your child dry and comfortable - cool in the warmer months, warm in the cooler months.

Excellent sun protection properties too - perfect for keeping your child's feet and legs covered, yet cool, when babywearing.

Because it's so soft and fine, mokopuna merino is exquisite against a baby's skin. Naturally non-allergenic, it will never irritate, scratch or itch. And if your baby's bum sports washable nappies, you'll find these footpants a great fit.

The natural antibacterial qualities of mokopuna merino garments mean that they don't need washing quite so often. And, even better, they are incredibly easy to care for; wash on a normal setting at 40 degrees and even tumble dry on low if necessary.

name: Flap Happy Wide Brim Sun Hat UPF50 - Aqua Punch Dots
description: 100% fine woven cotton sun hat by Flap Happy. Stylish retro/vintage look with a wide, super soft, moldable brim to keep the sun off baby's face and neck, making these hats great for babywearing. The wide brims on these hats also provide discretion when nursing in a carrier/sling.

name: Easycare Woven Wrap 05
description: Subtle greeny grey with light olive and cream stripes. Khaki weft. Looks very fitting with utility/military inspired garb. An absolute favourite. 3.7m, 4.2m and 5.2m sizes are available as a special order which takes approximately 7 working days for delivery. Please do get in touch if you would like to place an order for any sizes not listed as in stock. 100% Oeko-tex cotton Easycare woven wrap slings are beautifully soft straight out of their lovely matching drawstring bag. No breaking in required. Gentle and comforting against the skin of tiny newborns, they prove equally sturdy and supportive - as well as nice and wide - carriers for heavier babies and toddlers. In short, easycare woven wraps are very high quality and beautifully finished, designed in a range of colourways from subtle to bright.

name: Girasol Ring Sling - Chichi Red
description:
Vibrant shades of red and purple

2m length - suits all sizes

Ring slings are a wonderful alternative or addition to other baby carriers  they're surprisingly versatile and may be used from birth.

The simple but amazing mechanical application of two rings means that ring slings are quick and safe to use. The correct slightly squatting position with the legs spread apart for encouraging optimum hip growth may be very easily achieved with ring slings. Ring slings may be used from birth and are often the perfect start for all who want an uncomplicated introduction to baby carriers.

They're great everywhere babies need to be quickly "popped in and out": shopping, housework, short distances with tired toddlers, easy stair climbing, breast feeding, rocking babies to sleep ... and thanks to its small folded size, it will practically fit in any handbag.

Longer distances may also be covered with very small babies, but one-sided carrying will over time become a little more tiring with heavier children. But they can still be a great help even with toddlers: "I want to be carried!"  a situation that's much easier to handle with ring slings.

Girasol's ring slings are available in two lengths and made, gathered and sewn from the Girasol baby carriers that are woven with the tried-and-tested transposed or diamond twill binding and quality aluminium rings specially manufactured by slingrings.com.

And they may be washed like our other baby carriers at 60C, but we do recommend that the rings be tied together and secured in a little washing net or bag during washing to protect the machine.

+ May be used from newborn to toddler

+ The ideal carrier for quick and easy use in-between

+ Quick and easy to put on

+ Great for in the home and for shopping

name: ManyMonths Merino Wool Elephant Hood
description:
Another innovative, cool babywearing essential from the Scandinavians! 

The Elephant Hood is made from 100% soft and light merino wool. Perfect for protecting the neck, chest and upper back. Protection of the chest is especially essential for babies who are getting new teeth and are drooling. The hood is perfect as such in mild weather and great for layering when it is really cold and freezing.

Comfortable for sleeping in, since the elastic in the back is completely covered with wool and all seams are flat. Very stretchy, accommodates different head shapes really well. Superb for babywearing on the back  difficult for children to take off and throw away. Stays on even while dressing in a babywearing jacket.

Charmer/Explorer to fit approx 3-12 months
Adventurer/Conqueror to fit approx 12 months to 3/4 years

name: Easycare Woven Wrap 16
description: Dreamy cream, camel and grey stripe with a camel weft. Classy. 100% Oeko-tex cotton Easycare woven wrap slings are beautifully soft straight out of their lovely matching drawstring bag. No breaking in required. Gentle and comforting against the skin of tiny newborns, they prove equally sturdy and supportive - as well as nice and wide - carriers for heavier babies and toddlers. In short, easycare woven wraps are very high quality and beautifully finished, designed in a range of colourways from subtle to bright.

description:

name: Baby Leg Warmers - Merino Wool and Cashmere
description:
Sumptuous, soft leg warmers for babies and toddlers by German company, Hoppediz. Essential for keeping little legs warm and cosy during winter babywearing. Perfect as wrist warmers for older children and adults too.

45 % Merino wool, 30% Modal, 15% Polamide, 10% cashmere
Machine washable on a wool cycle

name: ManyMonths Merino Wool Babywearing Booties
description: Wonderful booties made for babywearing. Cold feet are often a problem for many babywearing families; no matter what you do, the feet of your child stay cold, sometimes not even a babywearing jacket helps. MaMDesign has designed the ultimate booties for the winter time. The booties have long stretchy double rib (also for protecting ankles) and a merino wool inner with micro fibre shell. All seams are embedded between the layers. Available in sizes Charmer (3-9 months) and Explorer (6-18 months) these booties are generously sized. Was 20.00

name: Aluminium Sling Rings
description:
Large Size
Inner diameter: 3" Outer diameter: 3.5" If you are using a heavy weight (winter weight) or heavy nap fabric, a very wide fabric (30"-45"), or have just had difficulty adjusting your sling in the past, you may want our large size rings. The large rings have successfully been used with a gathered shoulder, and are preferred for double-layered slings of nearly any material, as well as thicker wraps that are turned into slings.

Medium Size
Inner diameter: 2.5" Outer diameter: 3" If you are using a medium weight fabric, in widths of 26 "-30", you might be more comfortable with the medium size rings. This is also true if you are planning on making an open tail sling, or are using a pattern that yields a narrower shoulder. In general, the medium size rings will give you a sling that is secure, but may not be as easy to adjust as the large rings if your fabric is on the thicker side. Many people prefer medium rings when making a single-layer dupioni or shantung silk sling, especially if it will be machine-washed.

Small Size
Inner diameter: 2" Outer diameter: 2.5" Our small rings are best used with light weight and/or very smooth fabrics. They are well-suited to closed tail slings. If you plan to make your sling very narrow (22"-26"), you might also want the small rings. The small rings tend to be very secure, though not as easy to adjust as the larger rings. They are also good for onbuhimos.


Slate: shown with Didymos Latimeria Fish
Silver: shown with easycare 16
Black: shown with Didymos Pfau Petrol

Per pair

name: Connecta Baby Carrier - Easycare 01 Exclusive
description: The Connecta Baby Carrier is a soft structured carrier with a very simple, yet highly effective, easy to use design. Features Suitable from 3.5kg-16kg birth to toddler Wear on the front or back Based on traditional chinese mei tai but fastens with buckles for ease Wide base supports anatomically correct position for baby and optimum comfort for wearer Wide well padded shoulder straps Quick and easy to use Distinctive and innovative fabrics and designs for a contemporary look Wide 50mm webbing used throughout for comfortable front carries as well as back High quality low profile contoured nylon buckles with dual adjustable waist Accessory strap included that can be used as a chest strap, to narrow the body of the carrier to use with a younger baby, and to hold the carrier together when folded Uniquely shaped and contoured body Body can be rolled at the bottom to shorten if necessary Fits up to a UK ladies size 22 approx. (longer straps available by special request) Conforms to BS EN 13209-2:2005 All Connectas are constructed with two full layers of drill fabric in the body. They are sewn with extra strong thread (made for load bearing seams) on industrial sewing machines. The Connecta has been rigorously tested in a laboratory and passed the BS EN 13209-2:2005 safety standard for soft baby carriers.

description: 100% fine woven cotton sun hat by Flap Happy. Stylish retro/vintage look with a wide, super soft, moldable brim to keep the sun off baby's face and neck, making these hats great for babywearing. The wide brims on these hats also provide discretion when nursing in a carrier/sling.

name: Girasol Ardent Woven Wrap - MyGirasol Exclusive
description:
Girasol Ardent is an exclusive woven wrap designed by MyGirasol in Russia. Beautiful, subtle gradation of colours from black to orange, with purple, pink, yellow and cream in between. 

Available in creme and purple weft - the purple weft version has a darker, more dramatic hue.

Only pure untreated cotton that has neither been pre-bleached nor chemically finished is used for Girasol woven wraps. There is no use of formaldehyde, halogen-organic compounds, aromatic amines or brighteners. And their fabrics are not treated subsequently with chemicals or finishes. 

Girasol's select weavers are masters of a very difficult and ancient skill: diagonal weaving. A high-quality baby carrier produced with this method of weaving will always adapt elastically and never stretch out of shape. The hems have been doubled to prevent the edges from causing any unpleasant pressure. 

All Girasol fabrics may be washed in the machine at 60C . Baby carriers and slings shrink a little after the first wash  the lengths stated refer to the lengths after washing.

name: FlapHappy Sun Hat UPF50 - Navy
description: 100% fine woven cotton sun hat by Flap Happy. Stylish retro/vintage look with a wide, super soft, moldable brim to keep the sun off baby's face and neck, making these hats great for babywearing. The wide brims on these hats also provide discretion when nursing in a carrier/sling.

All cotton used is 100% certified organic. Dyes are free from heavy metals thus completely safe for babies and against sensitive skin. Each wrap comes with a three year guarantee and is presented in a blue Didymos box, complete with pictorial and visual (DVD) tying instructions. name: MaM isk Fleece Babywearing Poncho
description: Super stylish, very versatile poncho with matching scarf and hood. The Aiska is available in thick, cosy fleece. Suitable for during pregnancy, babywearing from birth to pre-school, and after your babywearing days are over, the Aiska is a fabulous investment piece from Finnish company, MaM Design. The Aiska has a matching hood and scarf offering many variations on use - the scarf can be buttoned around your neck, or used as a head rest for a younger/sleeping baby. You can use the hood yourself, or button it in a position to protect your child's head. Perfect. S/M - for those up to 5'5" L/XL - choose this size if you are 5'6" and above Was 100.00. name: FlapHappy Wide Brim Sun Hat UPF50 - Cherry Punch
description:
Cheerful cherry red with large white spots

100% fine woven cotton sun hat by Flap Happy. Stylish retro/vintage look with a wide, super soft, moldable brim to keep the sun off baby's face and neck, making these hats great for babywearing. The wide brims on these hats also provide discretion when nursing in a carrier/sling.

name: Je Porte Mon Bebe Stretchy Wrap - Light Grey/Olive
description: Beautiful colour combinations from subtle to intense make Je Porte Mon Bebe stretchy wraps the perfect choice for the utmost in chic wrapping. You can choose to pre-tie the wrap then pop Baby in and out without having to untie the wrap. This is really nice with newborns who need frequent changing. From Pre Tied Advanced Pocket Wrap Cross Carry, Baby can be worn in various positions according to his age and needs, on the front or the hip without having to untie the wrap. The wrap is dense, stretchy and breathable, it really molds Baby as a second skin and embraces his whole body without creases. 5m long and 70cm wide. Cotton 95% - Spandex 5%. Can be used with children from 2 to 14kg. 2 years warranty (except on seams). Heavy metal-free dye and treatments, Oeko Tex 100 (more info about norms and quality). Learn more about conformity and quality. The fabric is knit exclusively for JPMBB. There are many stretchy wraps on the market, but none can compare with the JPMBB wrap. Was 69.00

name: MaM Tunic Babywearing Coat Fleece
description: MaM babywearing tunic in fleece. Rather stylish Scandinavian design, and perfect for layering throughout the seasons. Can be used during pregnancy and when carrying a baby on the front or back, or without a baby at all. A timeless investment piece. Solid black for 2012 Natural coconut buttons, side pockets, and top/bottom opening zips. Machine washable. 360g polar fleece. S/M to fit up to UK12 L/XL to fit up to UK16 Was 94.00. All sales in sale category are final

name: Je Porte Mon Bebe Stretchy Wrap - Olive/Navy
description:
Beautiful colour combinations from subtle to intense make JPMBB stretchy wraps the perfect choice for the utmost in chic wrapping.

You can choose to pre-tie the wrap then pop Baby in and out without having to untie the wrap. This is really nice with newborns who need frequent changing.

From Pre Tied Advanced Pocket Wrap Cross Carry, Baby can be worn in various positions according to his age and needs, on the front or the hip without having to untie the wrap. 

The wrap is dense, stretchy and breathable, it really molds Baby as a second skin and embraces his whole body without creases.

5m long and 70cm wide. Cotton 95% - Spandex 5%. Can be used with children from 2 to 14kg. 2 years warranty (except on seams). Heavy metal-free dye and treatments, Oeko Tex 100 (more info about norms and quality). Learn more about conformity and quality.

The fabric is knit exclusively for JPMBB. There are many stretchy wraps on the market, but none can compare with the JPMBB wrap.

name: Cali Calo Luna Babywearing Jacket - Anthracite/Turquoise
description:
The Cali Calo Luna jacket is perfect for protecting you and your baby from the elements whether carrying in front, or on the back or hip, and can also be worn without a baby at all.

Made in France from premium quality, oekotex certified fleece, Cali Calo babywearing jackets come in subtle, stylish colours with pops of brighter accents on the collar, cuffs and pockets.

name: Easycare Woven Wrap 24
description: Black, light grey, dark grey multistripe. Black weft. 3.7m, 4.2m and 5.2m sizes are available as a special order which takes approximately 7 working days for delivery. Please do get in touch if you would like to place an order for any sizes not listed as in stock. 100% Oeko-tex cotton Easycare woven wrap slings are beautifully soft straight out of their lovely matching drawstring bag. No breaking in required. Gentle and comforting against the skin of tiny newborns, they prove equally sturdy and supportive - as well as nice and wide - carriers for heavier babies and toddlers. In short, easycare woven wraps are very high quality and beautifully finished, designed in a range of colourways from subtle to bright.

name: Easycare Woven Wrap 04
description: Sometimes less really is more - smart, pure navy blue with white and warm-toned pale blue narrow stripes. Navy blue weft. A perfect classic. 3.7m, 4.2m and 5.2m sizes are available as a special order which takes approximately 7 working days for delivery. Please do get in touch if you would like to place an order for any sizes not listed as in stock. 100% Oeko-tex cotton Easycare woven wrap slings are beautifully soft straight out of their lovely matching drawstring bag. No breaking in required. Gentle and comforting against the skin of tiny newborns, they prove equally sturdy and supportive - as well as nice and wide - carriers for heavier babies and toddlers. In short, easycare woven wraps are very high quality and beautifully finished, designed in a range of colourways from subtle to bright.

name: Girasol Romantique Woven Wrap - MyGirasol Exclusive
description: Arriving w/c 16 April 2012 Subtle gradation of soft colours from mid grey, to pinks, through to a deep berry shade make up Romantique, a Girasol Exclusive from MyGirasol in Russia. Light pink weft. Only pure untreated cotton that has neither been pre-bleached nor chemically finished is used for Girasol woven wraps. There is no use of formaldehyde, halogen-organic compounds, aromatic amines or brighteners. And their fabrics are not treated subsequently with chemicals or finishes. Girasol's select weavers are masters of a very difficult and ancient skill: diagonal weaving. A high-quality baby carrier produced with this method of weaving will always adapt elastically and never stretch out of shape. The hems have been doubled to prevent the edges from causing any unpleasant pressure. All Girasol fabrics may be washed in the machine at 60C . Baby carriers and slings shrink a little after the first wash the lengths stated refer to the lengths after washing.

name: Didymos Indio Woven Wrap Dark Blue/White
description:
Simple and very stylish, a Didymos Indio is a woven wrap design which deserves a place in every babywearer's wardrobe

Dark Blue/White has a mix of blue and black threads to produce the dark blue appearance - another perfect jeans wrap, but its darker hues give it a chicer, colder appearance than Blue/White

Didymos woven wraps are extremely high quality and have been designed and manufactured entirely in Europe since 1972. All cotton used is 100% organic. Each wrap comes with a three year guarantee and is presented in a blue Didymos box, complete with pictorial and visual (DVD) tying instructions.

Machine washable at up to 60 degrees celcius

name: Easycare Woven Wrap 14
description: Dark denim blue with warm cream and grey stripe. Cream weft gives the denim appearance. Perfect jeans wrap. Equally chic with plain navy or cream. 3.7m, 4.2m and 5.2m sizes are available as a special order which takes approximately 7 working days for delivery. Please do get in touch if you would like to place an order for any sizes not listed as in stock. 100% Oeko-tex cotton Easycare woven wrap slings are beautifully soft straight out of their lovely matching drawstring bag. No breaking in required. Gentle and comforting against the skin of tiny newborns, they prove equally sturdy and supportive - not to mention nice and wide -carriers for heavier babies and toddlers. In short, easycare woven wraps are very high quality and beautifully finished, designed in a range of colourways from subtle to bright.

name: Bra Barn Knot and Ring Shawl - Cornflower
description:
Solid blue with narrow turquoise, pistachio and white stripes. Blue weft. 
A lightweight babywearing solution from birth to pre-school.

Cornflower combines mid blue threads with fresh leaf green, turquoise and white narrow stripes along one rail. The Ring Shawl has turquoise rings.

Knot Shawl measures 2.75m in length, Ring Shawl 2.05m. Both have a width of 80cm.

A perfect addition to your core babywearing collection, Bra Barn Knot and Ring Shawls are lightweight yet super supportive, and suitable for beginner and experienced babywearers alike. 

Bra Barn Ring and Knot Shawls are made from 100% cotton. The cotton used is KO-TEX 100-CERTIFIED which means it fulfils the human-ecological requirements for products with direct contact to the skin. Machine washable at 40 degrees, tumble dry on low heat or let air/drip dry.

name: Easycare Woven Wrap 19
description: Warm red with rich purple and orange stripe. Red weft. Spicy. 3.7m, 4.2m and 5.2m sizes are available as a special order which takes approximately 7 working days for delivery. Please do get in touch if you would like to place an order for any sizes not listed as in stock. 100% Oeko-tex cotton Easycare woven wrap slings are beautifully soft straight out of their lovely matching drawstring bag. No breaking in required. Gentle and comforting against the skin of tiny newborns, they prove equally sturdy and supportive - as well as nice and wide - carriers for heavier babies and toddlers. In short, easycare woven wraps are very high quality and beautifully finished, designed in a range of colourways from subtle to bright.
